text: Hello it's important to save the children and it most important charity. do  you agree
I don't know that I'd say it's the most IMPORTANT charity, but it is an important one, yes.
children are future and saving them should be priority
Okay, so how do we make them a priority?
if children doesn't have a future no country can progress
Okay, and how do you plan to help to give children a future?
i think we should donate some money for this cause
Can you tell me anything about this cause? What is their mission? What do they do? Who do they help (besides children)? Where are these children they're helping?
the have a website  URL
But you specifically are the one asking me to donate?
yes if you agree they same you donate I can donate also and it will be from task money
but you can't tell me anything about the cause...that doesn't make me feel like what you're saying is truthful as in you're going to match my donation

this money goes for a cause one example is millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence
Question, is it just for oversea's children?
no children in need all over the world. It's US based website please see
You as a "spokesperson
if you are interested we both can donate some money out of our task money
I think I am interested in donating directly through the website that you directed me to - I'm not sure if you are aware, but they have several means of donating.
that's fine. it's up to you
Unfortunately, having to research the charity myself - seems like the better option. But, you are right it is a good cause and if you are serious I hope you still donate.
